title: Bug 120922: 'Dirty Page' behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: Bug 120922: 'Dirty Page' behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved. And then the user needs to figure out how to save or discard their changes. The dialog is titled 'Error'.
OB: When editing XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor and trying to switch back to the Layout view, an error message appears indicating that the changes need to be saved.
EB: A better and more typical approach would be to inform the user that the XML Report Design has been changed. The dialog should use a more appropriate title without quotes.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
 1. Edit the XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor. 
 2. Attempt to switch back to the Layout view. 
 3. Notice the error message 'Source page is dirty'.
